name: %s, Computer Love
storyline: Flick has not a complete memory. It is a posthuman being, which means it has a computer brain. Each time Flick makes a backup of its mind to free up space, Flick forgets parts of its life. Flick wanders the universe in order to document unknown parts of the cosmos, but what it really wants is to find a friend. It has been centuries since Flick has talked to anyone! One day, when an unknown bug attacks its operative system, Flick falls to the ground in what appears to be a tiny, tiny planet. There, Flick meets a nameless robot that swears it's not alive, and enrolls it in a strange scavenger hunt to (literally) make a friend.
summary: %s, Computer Love is a narrative-focused adventure game. You play as Flick, a post-human that explores the universe in hopes of making a friend in a world that has commoditized love and forgotten all about it.
